Specific Details: CEO of Ability West was contacted by Deputy Noel Grealish in relation to additional respite required by an adult with intellectual disability who avails of our services

Specific Details: Outlined COPE Galway Budget 2020 submission seeking the introduction of a range of measures to address housing supply for those who require social housing supports; the resourcing of a range of measures to tackle homelessness;  funding to ensure that there is at least 1 domestic violence refuge place per 10,000 of population; policy changes and additional funding specifically focused on addressing the needs of older people in the community; improvements to social welfare provision and healthcare
Subject Matter: Outlined COPE Galway Budget 2020 submission seeking the introduction of a range of measures to address housing supply for those who require social housing supports; the resourcing of a range of measures to tackle homelessness;  funding to ensure that there is at least 1 domestic violence refuge place per 10,000 of population; policy changes and additional funding specifically focused on addressing the needs of older people in the community; improvements to social welfare provision and healthcare
Intended Results: Seeking support for a range of measures we in COPE Galway put forward for inclusion in Budget 2020 in a submission made the Minister for Finance and Public Expenditure and Reform
Lobbying Activities: Forwarded on a summary of the points detailed on COPE Galway's submission made regarding Budget 2020|Meeting|1

Specific Details: Land in Barna, Co. Galway (GY55026) to rezone.
DPOs Lobbied: Noel Grealish|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas::Tomás Ó Curraoin|Councillor|Galway County Council::Seamus Walsh|Councillor|Galway County Council::Noel Thomas|Councillor|Galway County Council::Alastair McKinstry|Councillor|Galway County Council::Pádraig Mac an Iomaire|Councillor|Galway County Council
Subject Matter: Land in Barna, Co. Galway (GY55026) to rezone.
Intended Results: Change designation from Residential Phase 2 to Residential Phaze 1
Lobbying Activities:
Request to speak with regard to supporting the change in designation of Kennedy land in Barna, Co. Galway Folio GY55026 from Residential Phase 2 to Residential Phase 1.|Phone call|6-10::Initial phone call led to a Meeting with Noel Grealish at land in Barna in order that he could review the land with a view to advising on how to proceed with how to go about having the land re-designated from residential phase 2 to residential phase 1.
2nd meeting held in his office where he advised that we had to register as lobbyists to proceed with contacting anyone in relation to the land.|Meeting|2-5::Met Tomas O Curraoin  initially to discuss a request to support the re-designation of land in Barna from residential phase 2 to residential phase 1. Subsequently had a meeting at the land in Barna to review the land in light of the rezoning request.|Meeting|2-5
Grassroots directive: Please support a change from residential phase 2 to Residential phase 1 for .GY55026 Truskey West Barna, Co. Galway  in the Galway County Development plan 2022-2028
